Notes:   Track 21 recorded June 17 - 1974, Baton Rouge / Louisiana
This is a special collector edition housed in a 7" (17,5 cm) triple-fold-out cover. Includes a 18-pages booklet with extensive concert notes and photos. 

Two shows which were previously unreleased in any form in a package that doesn`t leave anything to desire. This release could once belong to the best FTD soundboard releases ever ! 
  
 
      
Concert:   Both concerts are strong with great set lists. Elvis takes the Tulsa show a bit more serious with less talk in between songs whereas in Cleveland he seems more relaxed and being in a joking mood. Tulsa was tour opener 1974 by the way, Two excellent concerts which will find the way to my player not just once. Excellent job, FTD ! (Ciscoking) 

Enjoy!

TCB,
Jeroep
